name: Hermin, the Rat King
description:
Hermin, the Rat King, is lost. Terribly lost.

To make matters worse, the phone his owner gave him has  no reception. 

And he's trapped in this stupid magic bubble!

"Rats..." he mutters to himself.

His mind returns to a clearing a little ways back.

"Reach the clearing,  get reception, call for help. Easy, right?"

The goal of Hermin is to reach the end of the level. The player controls a rat that rolls around inside a ball and can invert the level, flipping it upside down, to overcome the obstacle course of plants in their way.  

CONTROLS:

A, D / Left & Right Keys - Roll

W / Up Key - Jump

Space - Flip the level
